title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Education) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister education) (no 2) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Áine Doyle, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Áine Doyle, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Education, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
the Minister for Education, with effect from 9 April 2024.
text_norm: 2 aine doyle particular whose address deposited office department education appointed special adviser minister education effect 9 april 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 3. Michael Brennan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Michael Brennan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Education, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to the Minister for Education, with effect from 9 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

9 July, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [404] 3
